scripts.postinstall: echo postinstall at $(pwd) && pipenv install && yarn run config:cmake
scripts.config: yarn run config:py && yarn run config:cmake && yarn run config:cpp
scripts.config:cmake: cross-var cross-env KF_LOG_LEVEL_COMPILE="$npm_package_config_loglevel" pipenv run python python/cmakesetup.py
scripts.postconfig:py: pipenv install && pipenv run python python/cmakesetup.py
scripts.build:py: cross-var cross-env CMAKEJSOPT="$npm_package_config_cmakejsopt" pipenv run python python/pyinstaller.py
scripts.build: yarn run build:cpp && yarn run build:py
